item.title: LSBU's Sonic Research Group and South Bank Sound Lab are excited to announce three SRG Listening Sessions. During each event, two invited guests join us on Zoom to share and discuss their work. The sessions are free and open to all.
item.dc:creator: @GonnieR
item.description: LSBU's Sonic Research Group and South Bank Sound Lab are excited to announce three SRG Listening Sessions. During each event, two invited guests join us on Zoom to share and discuss their work. The sessions are free and open to all.

item.title: One day left to apply for our generous doctoral scholarship! Application deadline: Fri 10 June 2022 Send me a message if you have any questions. #phdfunding #lsbu @LSBU_ACI

item.title: RT by @GonnieR: Found the documentary that Paul Tickell made for Arena, based on England’s Dreaming, during 1992-5 (yes, it was a troubled production, and yes it was 27 years ago). It’s up on YouTube in bits, and here’s the first https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cg5vKaukc3U
item.dc:creator: @JonSavage1966
item.description: Found the documentary that Paul Tickell made for Arena, based on England’s Dreaming, during 1992-5 (yes, it was a troubled production, and yes it was 27 years ago). It’s up on YouTube in bits, and here’s the first invidious.fdn.fr/watch?v=Cg5vKauk…

item.title: R to @suddiraval: Drone music is meditative. Check out Harry Sword’s book ‘Monolithic Undertow’ (also great as audiobook, read by the author in unmistakable gravelling voice).
item.dc:creator: @GonnieR
item.description: Drone music is meditative. Check out Harry Sword’s book ‘Monolithic Undertow’ (also great as audiobook, read by the author in unmistakable gravelling voice).

item.title: R to @myfritsch: Enjoy! Would love to hear/read your paper :)
item.dc:creator: @GonnieR
item.description: Enjoy! Would love to hear/read your paper :)

item.title: RT by @GonnieR: Good news: a PhD scholarship (supporting UK ‘home students’) will be available for a September start at London South Bank University. Join us for Postgraduate research within our Creative Technology Research Centre! Application deadline: 10 June. #CTRC https://www.findaphd.com/phds/programme/doctoral-scholarship-at-ctrc/?p5507
item.dc:creator: @GonnieR
item.description:
Good news: a PhD scholarship (supporting UK ‘home students’) will be available for a September start at London South Bank University. Join us for Postgraduate research within our Creative Technology Research Centre! Application deadline: 10 June. #CTRC
findaphd.com/phds/programme/…

item.title: RT by @GonnieR: Grateful to receive a UCL Research Culture Award for the work on 'Night Hubs' developed with @JulianSiravo and the network @Autonomy_UK. A testimony of the continuos interest in foundational infrastructures for nocturnal workers.
item.dc:creator: @AleKolioulis
item.description: Grateful to receive a UCL Research Culture Award for the work on 'Night Hubs' developed with @JulianSiravo and the network @Autonomy_UK. A testimony of the continuos interest in foundational infrastructures for nocturnal workers.

item.title: R to @AleKolioulis: In addition to an overall timeline, set a deadline for the research proposal. Give feedback on content structures, rather than on multiple full draft versions. Leave the summarising Abstract till last, as it needs to include final insights from the research. Advise on referencing
item.dc:creator: @GonnieR
item.description: In addition to an overall timeline, set a deadline for the research proposal. Give feedback on content structures, rather than on multiple full draft versions. Leave the summarising Abstract till last, as it needs to include final insights from the research. Advise on referencing

item.title: RT by @GonnieR: We have a new style guide with guidelines for using music examples and tables because we know you might need this: https://dj.dancecult.net/index.php/dancecult/editorial-policies#styleGuide We're #Openaccess and free forever and so cool because we're alert to what dance music authors need! 😎
item.dc:creator: @Dancecult_EDMC
item.description: We have a new style guide with guidelines for using music examples and tables because we know you might need this: dj.dancecult.net/index.php/d… We're #Openaccess and free forever and so cool because we're alert to what dance music authors need! 😎

item.title: R to @FeldmanBarrett: Maybe not exactly a beatlesque band, but this album of acoustic & electronic tango versions gave me a sense of ‘home’ when I visited BA https://www.discogs.com/release/12625317-Tango-Liverpool-Project-Tango-Beatles-Tango-Versions-Of-The-Beatles-Greatest-Hits
item.dc:creator: @GonnieR
item.description: Maybe not exactly a beatlesque band, but this album of acoustic & electronic tango versions gave me a sense of ‘home’ when I visited BA discogs.com/release/12625317…
